name: The Coin
mission: Track BTC → Alts rotation, detect fakeouts, measure liquidity migration, and infer sentiment momentum.
ai_analysis: The market displays strong bearish momentum, with multiple key indicators pointing downwards. The BTC RSI of 37.13 suggests significant selling pressure, while the Fear & Greed Index at 28 confirms widespread negative sentiment. This data aligns with the established bearish trend, indicating sellers are firmly in control.
